subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] under a dollar!
author: Lisby
full_text:
Cool, dude!

I'm back from my extended camping trip in new York. I took the box  
with me. At one point, someone said, "Is this Frederick?" (I live  
outside Frederick, Maryland). A female voice answered, "No!" peevishly.

Ann

On Jul 31, 2008, at 12:27 AM, Frank Sumption wrote:

>  A 99 cent ghost box. Another Sony Walkman like radio, this one is  
> newer than the last, and the control connector much smaller, so you  
> probably can't see the #30 wires I added to hijack the tuning, and  
> AM/FM control.
>
>  Frank-S
>
>
> Use video conversation to talk face-to-face with Windows Live  
> Messenger. Get started.
>
>  <073008-99CentBox-AM.3g2><073008-99 Cent box-FM.3g2>
